meanings.definition: A transparent sheet of celluloid or similar material on which objects are drawn or painted for traditional animation.
meanings.sent1: The artist carefully painted the character on the cel.
meanings.sent2: The cel was used to create the animated movie.
meanings.sent3: The cel decided to showcase its artistic talent by drawing a self-portrait.
meanings.sent4: The cel of creativity brought the animated world to life.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors on the cel made the animation pop.

meanings.sent1: The cel proudly displayed their Celtic heritage.
meanings.sent2: The ancient texts were written in the cel language.
meanings.sent3: The cel told a funny joke in their native tongue.
meanings.sent4: The cel culture is rich in history and tradition.
meanings.sent5: The music of the cel people resonated through the hills.

meanings.definition: A unit of luminous intensity equal to one candle.
meanings.sent1: The room was lit by a single cel.
meanings.sent2: The cel measurement helped determine the brightness of the light.
meanings.sent3: The cel challenged the candle to a brightness competition.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the sky twinkled like tiny cels.
meanings.sent5: The cel of light illuminated the path ahead.
